Expected Result: User should be logged in successfully
User should see an error message
User should see a 'User not found' message
User should be prompted to enter credentials
User should remain logged in after refresh

Test Case Description: Verify payment with valid card details
Expected Result: Payment should be processed successfully
User should receive an 'Invalid card' error
User should receive a 'Payment declined' message
Transaction should be canceled successfully
Amount should be refunded within the expected timeframe
User account should be created successfully
User should see 'Email already in use' message
User should be prompted to use a stronger password
User should be prompted to fill all required fields
User should receive a verification email

Test Case Description: Verify profile update with valid details
Expected Result: Profile should be updated successfully

Test Case Description: Verify profile update with invalid email
Expected Result: User should see an error message
Profile picture should be uploaded successfully
User should receive a confirmation before deletion
User should be able to change password successfully

Test Case Description: Verify placing order with valid details
Expected Result: Order should be placed successfully
User should see an 'Out of stock' message
User should see a correct order summary

Test Case Description: Verify applying a valid discount code
Expected Result: Discount should be applied correctly
User should be able to cancel order before shipping
Item should be added successfully
Item should be removed successfully
Total price should be updated correctly
Item quantity should be updated correctly
All items should be removed from the cart

Test Case Description: Verify searching for an existing product
Expected Result: Relevant search results should be displayed

Test Case Description: Verify searching for a non-existent product
Expected Result: User should see a 'No results found' message
